body.name: Gizoon 5 Drawers Chest, White Dresser for Dedroom with Large Storage Capacity, Chest of Drawers with Embedded Handle, Sturdy Anti-Tripping Device for Hallway, Office, Living Room
features: 🎄【Excellent Storage Capacity】: The elegant 5-drawer dresser is 28.2"L×16.2"W×37"H. Five extra-wide and deep drawers have large capacity and flat, open tabletop to provide more storage space for your belongings, such as clothes, toys, skin care products, towels, etc. You can easily become an expert organizer and say goodbye to clutter.

🎄【Sturdy Structure】: This white chest is made of MDF material, which is hard and has a high load-bearing capacity. With curved decorative lines the base is very stable, with an anti-tripping device to make the cabinet firmly against the wall, always protects you and your family's safety, and never have to worry about the cabinet shaking! Load-bearing data: small drawer 20lbs, large drawer 33lbs,dresser top 55lbs.

🎄【Modern style & safety design】: This drawer chest is very durable with decorative lines throughout. The stylish embedded handles and fashionable base look graceful and are highly ornamental and safe. And you don't have to worry about bumping into the cabinet and getting hurt by raised handle.

🎄【Easy to Assemble】: Are you worry about the difficulty of installation? This white dresser has a simple structure and comes with a detailed installation manual and professional customer service to help you install the chest of drawers quickly and successfully. You can assemble it alone or two people together.

🎄【Multifunctional Applicable Scenes】: This versatile cabinet is very adaptable to various scenes. It can be a clothes organizer in bedroom, a large-capacity toy collector and decorated display in living room, or a book and file holder in study or office. Believing it can be a nice choice.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gizoon 5 Drawers Chest How do you decorate your house？ Are you picking out your favorite furniture? Why not choose these beautiful and simple drawers chests? Its five extra-wide and super-deep drawers have a large capacity and open tabletop to provide exclusive storage space for your belongings.
Suitable for Multiple-scenes Make your home more comfortable and tidier

More Details of the 5 Drawers Chest Rounded Corner Design Different from square, sharp corners, the graceful dresser's corners are rounded. In a degree,it can protect children from bumps. Embedded Handle Unlike other raised handles, the handle of this cabinet is built-in. It has a delicate look and allows you to easily pull out the drawer. Silent Slide Rail When you pull the drawers, you can feel like as smooth as skate on the ice. Make you enjoy the quiet. Elegant and Sturdy Base This sturdy cabinet is made of MDF material, which is hard and has a high load-bearing capacity. With curved decorative lines the base is very stable.

The Awesome Security of Safety Are you still worried about the safety of falling cabinets hurting your family, especially children? Don't worry, the anti-toppling device will help you. The anti-toppling device is made of tough metal, after being installed properly, it tightly fixes the cabinet to the wall, and you do not have to worry about the dresser falling down.

This Simple White Dresser is a Beautiful Home Decor Item The pure white cabinet with a modern style look can be matched in bedroom, living room, office, hallway, and so on. It can decorate your home while providing you with more storage space, and make it easy for you to become an organizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bad Reviews Inaccurate
reviews.reviewText: Im ngl, it’s a really good dresser for the price on it. Some other reviews mentioned..1. the instructions being too long2. parts missing3. unstable when builtThe instructions were long but detailed. It was really easy to follow tbh. The only reasons I can see them being bad is if you have bad eyesight and aren’t that bright of a person lol.I didn’t have a single missing screw but I also kept an eye out for all the pieces. Everything I needed was included, including a screwdriver and a few extra screws just in case.I mean it’s sturdy enough for the price. Especially if you follow the directions. You can definitely add more optional screws in some places to secure it better but it doesn’t teeter nor does it instantly collapse like some other reviewers wrote.I’m an 18 yr old girl and It took me about 3 hours to build it on my own. I was watching tv so it could possibly take 2 people an hour at most from start to finish with no distractions.It is also pretty spacious enough for what I needed it for. It looks exactly like the image.Maybe I’ll come back and add pictures. Overall pretty good for price. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased with the product
reviews.reviewText: The dresser is very nice. I am quite pleased with it. I needed something that was between 27-28 inches wide and 36-38 inches high and this was the only product I could find to those dimensions.I bought 3 of these units to fill the space exactly as I wanted and it did the job excellently.The finishing of the product is also excellent.Let me now turn towards a couple of issues that others may want to be aware of.Assembly of these units is as complicated as a typical Ikea piece of furniture. So it does take quite a bit of an effort to assemble it. The brochure says that it is supposed to take 60 minutes, but that would need superhuman energy or an expert to do it. Between myself and my daughter, it took an average of 3 hours to assemble each one, i.e. a total of probably 9 hours to do all three.The good part was that the assembly instructions are excellent and every part (inculding hardware) is labeled and shown in the instruction sheet too. Little chance of making a mistake.The second issue relates to the wood used for the drawers (not the structure). The drawers are made of rather soft wood, and I hope that these last. The issue I had at time of assembly was that I was using my drill screwdriver to make my life easier. I soon discovered that since the wood is very soft, it drives the screws into the wood when I used the powered screwdriver. So if you plan to use any powered screwdriver, please make sure you use it on low power otherwise you will break the wood or make the holes too large and it wont work. Or, you could use the manual screw driver which is provided with the kit and that way you will not damage the soft wood.Another small issue is that the metal slides attached to the drawers are fixed. You have to use a screw to fix the drawers to the slides. Once this is fixed, you cannot remove the drawers from the unit unless you remove the screws. That can be a bit of a pain. And what I am worried about is that over time, if I were to remove and reassemble the drawer screws a few times, the drawers may fall apart because of the soft wood.The base of the drawers used a good quality plywood. So I expect that these will not sag. I did like the extra support at the bottom of the larger drawers to ensure that the base will not sag in the middle.All hardware used is very similar to Ikea and quite good. The wall bracket in the back for security is also excellent. Very sturdy.I just might add that even though it took time to assemble, it was not physically exhausting. Maybe it was because I used the drill screwdriver and did not have to exert as much. Or because the parts were not huge that required too much effort to lift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes a great closet island!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these. Didn’t love paying $80 for shipping, but they got here in good condition and much faster than expected. Quality is better than I anticipated, and let's be honest, your expectations of a $99 dresser should be directly associated with the price you paid. My husband put them together in about 3.5 hours and said he was impressed. (He's got lots of experience assembling things I buy!) No issues and only one or two curse words were uttered in the process (from him, not me). We bolted them back to back using the wall brackets they came with (that took both of us to do). I am very pleased with the outcome. Nice quality, perfect size and looks like a custom piece arranged this way!! Lots of storage for both of us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thought it would have been a little bigger but it is the specs it says so that was more my issue not reading the dimensions. It is a nice piece. My daughter was able to put it together herself and she is happy with it, so it’s a win for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean, easy to assemble, perfect parts fitting
reviews.reviewText: Title says it all. For the price, it's a great find. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I wouldn't buy again
reviews.reviewText: where to start?Ok, the instructions were horrible. someone was told to keep it to 10 steps so some of the steps have 15-20 operations, with tiny hard to follow diagrams.Then of course there's the mis-labeled and unlabeled parts. why in the world can't they get this kind of stuff right? maybe because they really don't care.Let's move on to the hardware. I have never used such lightweight hardware. the screws etc are one-use. if you have to back it out, you may as well throw it away.finally, one key piece of one of the drawers was broken. hard to say whether it was poorly packaged or just a crummy piece of wood. glued together, it may actually hold up. fingers crossed.short story, these folks need to do a lot more work on their product.DO NOT BUY!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice kit except missing 20 screws needed to put together.
reviews.reviewText: I would have rated higher but now I have wait to see if the company is going to send screws, or if I will be returning it.It's a shame quality control does not check to make sure all the parts in the box.Good value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was just looking for something to use as a nightstand with drawers, found this and it served the purpose. I wasn't putting too much thought into, just looking for "something" since there isn't much in the way of usefulness AND quality for what I needed. Found this, ordered it, opened the box and found that the quality of the parts were the BEST I had seen in a LONG time, like over 20 years long! The final product is sturdy, useful, and I couldn't be happier!! Best value for the money and due to the quality of the materials used to make this, I am SURE this will last me a very long time! Very very happy!!
